field.name: assetType
field.remark: Asset type: 0- fund(account book) 1- credit limit 2- bonus ##3- bank capital 4- free resource

field.name: itemType
field.remark: Asset item types: 0-Free resource #1- Undefined 2- Cash 3- Exclusive account book balance 4-Credit limit 5-Bonus 6-Exclusive credit limit 7-Common negative-balance account book 8-Exclusive negative-balance account book 9-Guarantee deposit item 10ï¼šdebt bill item(for shanghai credit control ) 11:prepayment item(activity prepayment), only support allot from this item to normal item, cannot write-off

field.name: itemClass
field.remark: 0: atomic asset items 1: aggregate asset items (aims at free resource, balance, credit limit items)

field.name: isReward
field.remark: Whether the asset is reward 0: false 1: true

field.name: allowAdjust
field.remark: Whether allows to adjust 0: false 1: true

field.name: allowRefund
field.remark: Whether allows to refund 0: false 1: true
